description: The forest is your choir, conductor.
The /b/Wand of the Forest/b/ is a crucial tool for mana manipulation.
The Wand lets you bind /b/Mana Spreaders/b/, /b/Flowers/b/, and any other mana related equipment via /6/Shift-Right Clicking/6/ on them, then /6/Right Clicking/6/ the destination.
Holding the Wand lets you /6/inspect/6/ the /b/Mana/b/ within an object.
The Wand has other useful applications which are more useful later. For now, let's move on to getting some mana so you can make use of your fancy new stick.
